item.title: Gemini 2.5 Spatial Reasoning
item.description: Testing the limits of Gemini 2.5 Spatial Reasoning capabilities on the example of fiber construction trenches

item.title: Googles Android should not be called Open Source
item.description: I used to be a passionate Android fan. I used to tell people that phones running Android were a much better choice than iPhones. Now, I think differently.
